Text:
Oops! It seems like I attracted only a bunch of parasites with this torrent. People that download but don't allow any upload.

Hey guys! Did you ever hear about the concept of 'file sharing'? If you don't allow any upload, it will take for ever to get this package out.

I planned to publish season 2 and 3 after this torrent was properly distributed, but I don't know if I care to make that happen if you are not willing to assist me.
